name: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
details: Foundational certification showcasing knowledge of AWS cloud services, cloud computing concepts, security, pricing, and support models.

name: Certified Scrum Master (CSM)
details: Demonstrates understanding of Scrum framework, agile principles, and ability to facilitate Scrum ceremonies and coach development teams.

name: Oracle Certified Professional Java SE
details: Professional-level certification validating advanced Java programming skills, object-oriented design principles, and enterprise application development.
